text: The Last of Us is an American post-apocalyptic drama television series created by Craig Mazin and Neil Druckmann for HBO. It is based on the video game series created by Naughty Dog. The series is set twenty years into a pandemic caused by a mass fungal infection, which causes its hosts to transform into zombie-like creatures and causes an apocalypse. The series has received positive reviews from critics and audiences. ==References== Category:HBO television series Category:2023 American television series debuts Category:2020s American drama television series
title: The Last of Us (TV series)
